sect2.para: Download the ZIP file from the VLS Windows download page, unzip-it and run setup.exe.

simplesect.title: Install the libraries
simplesect.para: Many libraries are needed for particular uses :

listitem.para: libdvdcss if you want to be able to access encrypted DVDs ,
libdvdread if you want to be able to stream DVDs ,
libdvb if you want to be able to stream from a DVB card (a satellite card or a digital terrestial TV card).
